about.name: About
about.title: About Me
about.description: This is the description of me
about.hero_title: We are changing the concept of healthy eating all over the world
about.hero_content: Abu Auf Company was established in 2010 and has become one of the most famous names in the market to provide high-quality natural coffee products, nuts and nut butters, healthy foods, dried fruits .. and more, each product has its own story; Because of our constant attention to detail, every step of the production process at Abu Auf is carefully managed to ensure high quality products that are delivered with love and filled with nourishing ingredients from Mother Nature. We prioritize product innovation and take into account market trends, customer desires and changing tastes, and always encourage a healthy lifestyle. ; Because our goal is not only to nourish the body, but also to nourish the mind and spirit, through a variety of different herbs and organic products. We hope to tell the story of the change you can make in the world when you change your eating habits to ones that are healthy, fun and delicious.
about.mission_content: 'Abu Auf was founded with a vision to change the future of food. Who said healthy food can't be delicious?'
about.now_content: We now have more than 150 branches in Egypt and our products can be found in most major supermarkets such as Carrefour, Metro, Awlad Ragab, Panda, Oscar, Saudi, Hyper One and Spinneys. We also supply many of our products to a group of the most luxurious hotel chains such as St. Regis, Four Seasons, JW Marriott, Marriott, Le Meridien, Ritz-Carlton and Westin, in addition to the Duty Free Company and Egypt Air, which we have been supplying with our products for more than 10 years. Last but not least, as we want to make sure that you are always awake and have a good amount of energy on the road, so we offer Abu Auf Special Turkish Coffee at 55 petrol stations and flavored teas can also be found at 20 stations.We make sure to satisfy every customer's taste and provide a variety of products that are indispensable for daily consumption of food and beverages, such as coffee, tea, honey...etc. Abu Auf is the brand of choice in the healthy and delicious snack market, as we provide easy access to healthy food and encourage a healthy lifestyle.
